attributes.action: Allow suferers of all long term conditions free prescriptions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All suferers of long term conditions such as psoriasis and asthma deserve to be exempt from prescription charges. This will save the NHS money on the long run as people will be able to control their conditions better resulting in less hospital admissions for acute exacerbations of symptoms.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
